snippet.title: Valor Of Man Demo Trailer - Tactical Turn-Based Roguelike RPG
snippet.description:
Lead your party through a roguelike tactical RPG where enemies react to your actions, creating endless opportunities for strategic outmaneuvering. Valor Of Man delivers infinite replayability, constant progression and challenging decisions at every turn.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2699280/Valor_Of_Man/
Discord: https://discord.gg/eJK4GvSDE5
